amsmota@... wrote:

>
> I thought that's what we've been talking since the beginning...
> 

Yes, I've been saying the same things repeatedly.  You *can* do this,
it just isn't using the uniform interface, therefore it isn't REST, if
it's the client dictating what batch of resources to delete.

In a uniform interface, the client calls the DELETE method of each
resource it is interested in deleting.  Otherwise the client has zero
chance of accurately verifying deletion, because nothing is visible.

-Eric
